Mission Orders

The Lokians are still up to the same old tricks.

Destroy the {@LinkCreature:25#3011#consecrated Lokians}, {@LinkCreature:25#3012#shurian champions}, {@LinkCreature:25#3021#primal Lokians}, {@LinkCreature:25#3022#shurian magisters}, {@LinkCreature:25#3031#primal Lokian darkweavers}, and {@LinkCreature:25#3032#hallowed Lokian knights}.

Report to Coordinator Delwen when mission is complete.
Youâ€™ve earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
